data.question: What are the most popular three articles of all time?
data.query: select title,populararticles.views from articles join populararticles on articles.slug=populararticles.slug limit 3;

data.question: Who are the most popular article authors of all time?
data.query: select authors.name,sum(views) from authors join articles on authors.id=articles.author join populararticles on articles.slug=populararticles.slug group by authors.name order by sum desc;

data.question: On which days did more than 1% of requests lead to errors?
data.query: select failedrequests.date,100.0 *(failedrequests.errors/allrequests.req) as percent from failedrequests,allrequests where failedrequests.date=allrequests.date and 100.0*(failedrequests.errors/allrequests.req) > 1.0 order by percent;

views.query: create view populararticles as select substring(path,10) as slug,count(*) as views from log where status like '2%' and log.path != '/' group by slug order by views desc;
create view allrequests as select to_char(log.time,'FMMonth dd,YYYY') as date,cast(count(*) as float) as req from log group by date order by req desc;
create view failedrequests as select to_char(log.time,'FMMonth dd,YYYY') as date,count(*) as errors from log where status not like '2%' group by date order by errors desc;
